query:
SELECT
      date,
      from,
      to,
      token_address,
      value
    FROM (
      SELECT
        toStartOfDay(block_timestamp) AS date,
        from,
        to,
        token_address,
        SUM(toUInt256OrNull(value)/POWER(10,18)) AS value
      FROM dbt.transfers_erc20_bluechips
      WHERE block_timestamp >= DATE '2025-05-20'
      GROUP BY 1, 2, 3, 4
    )
    WHERE value > 1000
    ORDER BY date ASC, value DESC
